Articles.Content:
so... i entered my career game... collected some science... entered the R&D facility... no nodes !![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

any ideas why ?

thanks

-Shawn.
